  2. 12 years on, Stardew Valley creator swears "On the honor of my family name, I will never charge money for a DLC or update for as long as I live"  Gamesradar
  3. Stardew Valley Creator Pledges to Never Charge Fans for Post Launch Content In Any Of His Games  IGN
  4. Stardew Valley Creator Makes Bold Claim About Updates and DLC  GameRant
  5. Stardew Valley creator swears 'on the honor of my family name' that he'll never charge money for DLC  PC Gamer

item.title: The Operator is the deep state sim I’ve craved for so long - Polygon
item.description:
1. The Operator is the deep state sim I’ve craved for so long  Polygon
  2. The Operator review – a fun puzzle game that gets too conspiratorial  PCGamesN
  3. The Operator was originally only playable through computer terminal  Gamereactor UK
  4. Find the Truth and Become The Operator  GameSpace.com
  5. The Operator Review - Who Wants To Be A CSI Agent?  TheGamer

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3 "was the push over the cliff" that got Warframe devs to add a romance system to the MMO's massive 1999 update - Gamesradar
item.description:
1. Baldur's Gate 3 "was the push over the cliff" that got Warframe devs to add a romance system to the MMO's massive 1999 update  Gamesradar
  2. Warframe's upcoming 1999 expansion adds a romance system, and it's all thanks to Baldur's Gate 3  PC Gamer
  3. Warframe’s 2024 journey includes a Metal Gear-inspired quest and instant message dating  Polygon
  4. An easter egg in the new Warframe 1999 quest pays tribute to one of the best FPS games ever  PCGamesN
  5. Warframe's 1999 expansion has a shopping mall, romance system, and you even get to fight a boyband  Eurogamer
